history.proof: unfold Lim. srun best use: Lim_seq_ext_loc, is_lim_seq_Rbar_loc_seq, is_lim_seq_unique unfold: eventually.

exceptions.exn: In environment x : Rbar Unable to unify "Lim ?M2363 ?M2364 = ?M2365" with "Lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rbar_loc_seq x n) = x".
In environment H : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim f x l -> Lim f x = l x : Rbar Unable to unify "Lim ?M2521 ?M2522 = ?M2523" with "Lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rbar_loc_seq x n) = x".

original: unfold Lim. intros. apply is_lim_unique. apply H.
